name: Color Crash!
description:
Click on a car and use the a and d keys to move them, swipe controls are also supported

Your goal: Form the perfect traffic system!

Cars continuously flow into the screen on this busy highway! Prevent crashes, stop overflow and merge cars! As the game progresses, the amount of cars and the diversity of cars also increases. But watch out! The highway merges together over time to only 3 lanes!

With 6 unique colors & uncapped max flow rate; control runs out realll fast!
